participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending my free time surfing and learning new things about the ocean.
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.
My ethnicity is not important, but my feet hurt after long runs in my boots.
i work on trucks.
I don't have my own car, but I'm working on it!

participant_2.background:
I like to make clothes and my spouse works in the music industry.
I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love.
i like watching action adventure movies and eating popcorn.
I don't own a car because I value my time and prefer to take public transportation or walk to restaurants.
i wear cardigans because i hope it makes me look more cultured.

content.text: Good, thanks for asking! My husband's band is playing a show tonight, so I'm excited to go see them and then go out dancing with some friends.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love live music. I'm not sure what I'm doing tonight yet. I might go surfing if the weather is good.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I wish I could surf, but I'm not coordinated enough.
It takes a little practice, but it's a lot of fun. I've been surfing for a few years now, and I still love it.
I'm sure it is a lot of fun. I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get out in nature and get some exercise.
I will definitely look into it. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to make clothes, watch movies, and go out to eat.
Oh, that's cool! I love to cook. I'm not very good at making clothes, but I like to try.
I'm not very good at cooking, but I love to eat!
Well, we could always trade recipes sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to try some of your cooking.
Great! I'll send you some of my favorites.
